A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not absolutely terrible\, but hardly a good addition to Star Wars films.  I enjoyed The Force Awakens\, loved Rogue One\, and grew up with the original trilogy.   This film was 30 minutes too long\, too focused on cheap laughs\, and not only not live up to the hype\, but failed to live up to the name Star Wars.  I expected to watch it a few times in the theater and dread if I have to sit through it again.
